General.Name: Hainan Shennong Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Hainan Shennong Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the breeding, seed production, and sale of hybrid rice seeds in China. The company offers crop seeds, including hybrid rice seeds, corn seeds, rapeseed seeds, vegetable and fruit seeds, etc. It also engages in the innovation, production, sale, and technical services of hybrid rice seeds, rice, corn, oilseeds, vegetables, and other crop varieties; and the sale of pesticides and fertilizers, as well as wholesale and retail business. The company was formerly Hainan Shennong Technology Co., Ltd. Hainan Shennong Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Haikou, China.
General.Address: Huiyuan Meilin Valley Comp Service Bldg, Haikou, China, 570311
